fields.headline: Italia con brio
fields.bodyText: From top to the toe Where to go and where to stay in Italy. King of the castle In the village of San Gemini, staying in a palace can cost no more than a motel. Look on the bright side Cervinia has some advantages over northern skiing resorts... it's stunning, it's cheap and it's Italian. Sloping off Pisa's famous tower has reopened to visitors, but there is much more on offer in the city. Southern comfort Artistic hotels, volcano-lit suppers... On Sicily and the tiny nearby islands even the decadence is tasteful. Surfing the city The superhighway leads to Rome by a roundabout route.
